blurb: A vetted-user gallery for CGAI: publish, organize, license, and distribute pro-created AI content with rigorous moderation and provenance.
description: GGAI is the gallery layer for CyberGeishaAI (CGAI). It provides creator onboarding & verification, multi-stage moderation, watermarking, licensing templates, perceptual-hash dedupe, audit logs, and optional Lightning payouts. Operators can configure geo/age gating, safety filters, and federated mirrors. This repository does not include any adult imagery.
